CLIENT.enterPIN: Please enter your PIN to be connected to the kindergarten.

AUTH.usernameLength: Please use a name with at least 6 and at most 32 characters.
AUTH.passwordLengthError: Password must be at least 6 and at most 12 characters in length.
AUTH.passwordSpecialError: Password must contain 1 or more special characters.
AUTH.passwordUpperError: Password must contain 1 or more uppercase characters.
AUTH.passwordLowerError: Password must contain 1 or more lowercase characters.
AUTH.passwordDigitError: Password must contain 1 or more digits.
AUTH.pwResetMessage: Password reset link has been sent to this email address. Not yet received? Check the spam folder!
AUTH.firstNameLength: First name must be 64 characters at most.
AUTH.invalidFirstname: Please enter a valid first name.
AUTH.lastNameLength: Last name must be 64 characters at most.
AUTH.invalidLastname: Please enter a valid last name.

ERROR.invalidCredentials: You have entered an incorrect username or password
ERROR.serverUnreachable: The Klix network is currently unavailable
ERROR.existingUser: A user with this username already exists.
ERROR.existingEmail: A user with this email already exists.
ERROR.unprocessableEntityMsg: The new account could not be created.
ERROR.idPictureError: There is more than one face recognized or there is an error in recognition of the photo.
ERROR.notAFace: No face found. Your reference image must contain your face.
ERROR.unsupportedformat: File format not supported. Allowed formats are: .jpg, .png, .jpeg
